item.title: 21 Jump Street Cast & Cameos
item.description: Jonah Hill & Channing Tatum lead an all-star cast in the 2012 comedy classic 21 Jump Street, which also features surprise cameos from the TV series.

item.title: "That's All Sob Stuff": Tolkien Debunked One Of The Biggest Misconceptions About The Hobbit 58 Years Ago
item.description: While Tolkien originally talked of The Hobbit as a fairy story, it is not specifically for children, but has tonal elements of childrenâ€™s stories.

item.title: "I Wanted to Make Up For All The Disasters": Disney Didn't Accept Mighty Ducks 4 Script Despite Being Written By Key Star
item.description: Disney didn't accept a script for The Mighty Ducks 4 despite the screenplay being written by star Emilio Estevez, who opens up about the story.
